EmailTemplate.name: Repair ready pick up started NOI
EmailTemplate.subject: Your repair is ready
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./Ms. {!Contact.LastName},
Your RIMOWA ***[Model]*** repair is now complete!
I am happy to confirm we have received your suitcase and it's now ready for pick-up.
Feel free to let us know when would be the best time for you to collect your suitcase at {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} or if you prefer to have the case shipped to you complimentary.
I kindly remind you that your suitcase must be picked up within 30 days. Should the pick-up not take place within the next 30 days following this notice, your suitcase may be stored and charges may apply and be invoiced to you.
Please don't hesitate to reach out to me in the case you should not be able to pick up your case in time, I will be delighted to find another solution for you.
Best,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
